description:
Souzu Rikai is a former http://anidb.net/t7112 [ghoul investigator] and alumni of the http://anidb.net/ch99445 [Sunlit Garden]. They served as one of http://anidb.net/ch98685 [Arima Kishou]`s personal squad until their defection at http://anidb.net/ch95846 [Cochlea]. They and their squad now serve as one of http://anidb.net/ch99076 [Kaneki Ken]`s bodyguards.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Souzu Rikai
